property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets -1 damage and +2 to its powerful rating. Add 1 safe attack from your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your safe attack gets a damage penalty, it gets +3 damage. E [Once per turn] Discard 1 safe card from your card pool: Your opponent adds 1 card from their hand to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This safe attack gets -1 damage and +1 speed. E: Add this card to your card pool: Your opponent adds 1 card from their hand to their card pool and then draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card from your opponent's card pool: Your opponent adds 1 card from their hand to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Bass E: This attack gets -1 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Change this attack's zone to high: This attack gets -1 damage. Add 1 face down card from your opponent's staging area to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack's damage is less than its printed damage, it gets +2 damage. E Commit: If your opponent's attack's speed is greater than its printed speed, it gets -2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: Return this attack to its printed damage. This attack gets -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: Add 1 [Earth] foundation from your hand to your staging area. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Your turn] Remove: After an ability on an action card is played, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets +2 speed. If it deals damage, your opponent destroys 1 ready foundation. R: After the Ready Phase, reveal your momentum and add 1 ally attack from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Ally attacks get +1 speed. R: After 1 or more of your foundations are destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Ally card, add it to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If your opponent has 10 or more foundations, they destroy 2 foundations. E: Add 1 Ally card from your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent destroys 1 foundation and their block card does not clear from their card pool during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add 1 Ally foundation that you could normally play from your discard pile to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed during an attack, that attack gets -2 speed or +2 damage. E Commit: Your Ally attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an ally card, you may add it to your hand or to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn] Discard 1 card: Add 1 foundation from your discard pile to your staging area and then destroy it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this foundation is destroyed, if you have no momentum, add 1 ally attack from your discard pile to your momentum. First F Destroy: For the rest of this turn, whenever you play an ally attack, it gets +2 speed and you may change its attack zone.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn, once per turn] Add 1 card from your hand to your card pool face down: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you make a check, it gets +2 for each face down card in your card pool. E Discard 1 momentum: Draw 1 card. Playable by either player. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Add 1 face down card from your card pool to your momentum: This attack and its multiple copies get +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 face down card from your card pool: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Draw 1 card: This attack gets +1 damage for each card you have drawn this Enhance Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Add the top card of your deck to your card pool face down: This attack gets +2 or -2 speed. R Commit: After your opponent draws 2 or more cards due to their non-character effect, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you have drawn a card during this attack, your opponent discards 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Add 1 face down card from your card pool to the top of your deck. E: If you have drawn a card during this Enhance Step, this attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: Before a card is removed from your staging area due to an opponent's effect, remove this card instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F [Once per turn]: Your next slam or weapon attack this turn gets +X damage. X equals the highest printed difficulty on a card in your opponent's card pool. R Commit 1 foundation: After you block an attack, that attack does not clear from your opponent's card pool during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Your opponent adds the top card of their deck to their momentum. Choose 1 of their momentum and add it to their card pool face up. Knight Man R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, discard all cards played as blocks from your card pool and draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, choose 1 card in your opponent's card pool. It does not clear from their card pool during the End Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Throw for the rest of this turn. Combo E: Your opponent discards all cards from their card pool. This attack gets +3 damage for each card discarded.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: this attack gets +2 damage if there is a card in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Flip: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Add all revealed slam or weapon cards to your hand and discard the rest.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After your opponent plays an attack, its damage cannot be modified.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Commit: Your slam or weapon attack gets +1 damage for each card in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Destroy: Your slam or weapon attack gets +4 damage. Only playable if there is at least 1 card in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Your character cards get -3 difficulty. F [Once per turn]: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add 1 attack discarded in this way with a printed difficulty of X or less to your hand. X equals 2 plus the number of character cards in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is attached to your character, you may play "[Once per turn]" abilities on your character a second time each turn. R: After your ranged attack deals damage, attach this card to your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets Multiple:X. X equals the number of character cards in your staging area. During the End Phase, add all multiple copies of this attack to your staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card does not count towards progressive difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Add 1 character card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F [Once per turn] Discard 1 character card: Draw 1 card. E [Your turn] Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage for each character card in both staging areas (maximum 5).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After you take 4 or more damage, add 1 character card from your discard pile to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Once per turn, after this foundation is committed due to your opponent's effect, ready it. E Commit: Your ranged attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area with a printed difficulty of X or less. X equals the number of character cards in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Destroy 1 of your opponent's foundations or assets. E [Your turn]: If a foundation has been destroyed this turn, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Your turn] Remove: Your opponent loses 2 vitality. You may add 1 copy of this card from your hand to your staging area. R Commit: After your opponent plays a form or response ability on a non-character card, cancel its effect. Only playable if your opponent has lost vitality due to a card effect this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E: Destroy 1 of your opponent's foundations. Your opponent may lose 3 vitality to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your character's printed hand size is 5 or less, this attack gets -1 difficulty. E: Your opponent loses 2 vitality. Your opponent may discard 1 card to cancel this effect.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed. R (5+): After your opponent removes any number of cards from their card pool during the Combat Phase, they lose 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: If this is the only foundation in your staging area, add the top 2 cards of your deck to your staging area face down. R: After your opponent plays an ability that commits 1 or more of your foundations, they lose 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If a foundation has been destroyed this turn, change the zone of your attack to high. R Destroy: After 1 of your opponent's foundations is committed by your attack's ability, destroy it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability that adds any number of cards to their hand, they lose 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After the Ready Phase, seal 1 of your opponent's foundations. E [Once per turn]: If this attack has no abilities, add the top card of your deck to your momentum and your opponent discards 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Seal this attack. Playable by either player. R Commit: After your opponent plays a form ability on an asset or foundation, cancel it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent discards 1 momentum. Seal this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum. Seal this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your weapon attack gets +2 speed. Seal your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent's attack gets -2 speed. F Destroy: Your opponent discards 1 momentum. If they did, you may add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your Ready Phase, your opponent reveals 1 random card from their hand. If it is a high block, they discard it and draw 1 card. F Commit: The next attack you play this turn gets +1 damage for each of its abilities. Seal that attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your face up attack with no abilities gets +1 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After a card in your opponent's staging area is committed due to your effect, ready this character. E Commit, discard 1 non-character card: Your non-throw attack gets +X damage. X equals the discarded card's difficulty. If the discarded card was a weapon card, draw 1 card.

card.name: Let's Make This a Fair Fight

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Commit 1 card in your opponent's staging area. R: After your opponent plays an ability that adds any number of cards to their hand, draw 2 cards and discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reveal 1 weapon card from your hand: This attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Discard 1 weapon card: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. You may add 1 weapon card discarded this way to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is discarded during an attack, that attack gets +2 or -2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After your opponent plays an ability on 1 of their foundations or assets that has been played at least twice this turn, commit that card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block an attack with this card, it deals no damage during the Damage Step. F Commit, reveal 2 weapon cards from your hand: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, your opponent commits 1 foundation. E Reveal 1 weapon card from your hand: The next time you play a weapon foundation this turn, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage and +X speed. X equals 4 minus the lowest control on a card in your discard pile. R Discard 1 card: After you check a 1, that check gets +2. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Both players' next check to play a card this turn is a 6 (no check necessary). Draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has a control of 1, add it to your hand. E: If this attack is blocked, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum. Combo E: Draw X cards. X equals 4 minus the lowest control on a card in your discard pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is checked in order to play a foundation, that check gets +2. E: If this attack was played as a reversal, ready 2 cards in your staging area that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, if your opponent has at least 3 more foundations than you do, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Draw 1 card. If there are no cards with a control of 1 in your discard pile, discard 1 card. R Destroy: Before your Draw Step, shuffle any number of cards with a control of 1 from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard the top 5 cards from your deck: Your attack with a printed control of 1 gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After you check a 1, re-check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: If you have fewer foundations than your opponent, your checks to play cards get +1 for the rest of this turn. R: Before your opponent makes a check to play a mid block, the difficulty of that check becomes 7.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: For the rest of this turn, your attacks get Flash. E: If your attack has a printed speed of 2 or less, draw 1 card. After it resolves, you may add this card from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have fewer foundations than your opponent, this attack gets Multiple:2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have fewer foundations than your opponent, this attack gets Stun:2. R: Before your opponent makes a check to completely block this attack with a mid block, the difficulty of that check becomes 5.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack with 2 or less speed gets Stun:1. R Discard 1 card: After your attack with 2 or less speed is not blocked, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When this card is in your card pool, checks to play attacks get +1 and checks to play blocks get -1. F: Add this card to your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Your ranged attack gets +2 damage and -2 speed. R [Once per turn]: After your opponent makes a check against a difficulty of 7 or more, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your mid attack gets +1 damage. F Destroy: Look at the top card of your deck. Add it to your hand or momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Both players may add 1 foundation they could normally play from their hand to their staging area. E Commit 1 foundation: If the committed foundation was added to your staging area this turn, your attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add 1 slam attack with a difficulty of 4 or less from your discard pile to your hand. The next time you play a copy of that attack this turn, add this card to your staging area face down. R Remove: After your opponent adds a foundation to their staging area during the Combat Phase, remove it from the game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 foundation that you could normally play among them to your staging area and discard the rest.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Attacks in your card pool do not count towards the progressive difficulty to play this card. "G:M" E: Draw 1 card for each foundation that has been added to your staging area this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Add 1 foundation you could normally play from your hand to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: "G:M" R [Your turn] Commit: After a foundation is added to your staging area, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When committing cards to pass a check, committing this foundation counts as committing 2 foundations. After you commit this foundation to pass the check to play a non-attack card, destroy it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, if you have 3 or more foundations, add it to your staging area. R: After this card is added to your staging area, your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you discard this card due to your opponent's effect, add it and the top card of your deck to your staging area face down. E Discard 1 momentum: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Ready 1 of your opponent's foundations: Your attack gets +1 damage and +3 speed. E: If your opponent has no committed foundations, commit 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, you may discard it from your card pool or draw 1 card. R: After an attack receives a speed bonus, it gets +X or -X damage. X equals that speed bonus. R: After your opponent readies a foundation during the Combat Phase, add it to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Multiple copies of this attack get Safe for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent has more ready foundations than committed foundations, this attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent has more ready foundations than committed foundations, draw 1 card or add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F [Once per turn]: Your opponent flips 1 committed foundation.)

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Ready 1 of your opponent's foundations: Your attack gets +1 damage and +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, your next check this turn gets +2. E [Twice per turn] Ready 1 of your opponent's foundations: Your next check gets +1.)

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy: If your opponent has more ready foundations, they must add the top card on their deck to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn] Commit 2 foundations: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum. E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the highest Multiple rating on a card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You cannot play attack cards during your first turn of the game. The first card you attempt to play on your turn passes (no check necessary). R: After an attack deals 4 or more damage, add 1 card from your opponent's discard pile to the top of their deck. Your opponent must reveal 1 random card from their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with a card named Gemini Man, add it to your staging area. E: Your attack that shares at least 2 printed resource symbols with your character gains Multiple: 1. You can only use character cards in your staging area to pay for this attack's Multiple cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack is not blocked, your opponent loses 2 vitality. Your opponent may discard 1 card to cancel the effect. E [Once per turn] Discard 1 card: Add 1 attack from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn]: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and discard 2 of them. E: If your non-Throw attack deals damage, gain vitality equal to your momentum. E: Your attack gets +1 speed for each of your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn]: After you play a Flash attack, add 1 other Flash attack from your card pool to your momentum. R Discard 1 momentum: After an attack is played, your opponent destroys 1 foundation. If the destroyed foundation's difficulty was 1 or less, this attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your Breaker, Charge, or Stun attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage. Only playable if there are no cards in your opponent's card pool. E [Your turn, once per turn] Lose 2 vitality: Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to the top of their deck. Add 1 foundation from their discard pile to their staging area committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Twice per turn] Discard 1 card: Draw 1 card. R Discard 1 card: After you play an attack with the Reversal keyword, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: At the start of each Combat Phase, lose 1 vitality. You may only play up to 4 cards from your hand each turn. E Discard 2 cards: Gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After an attack gets a speed or damage bonus, that attack gets -2 speed or damage. E Commit: Commit 2 of your opponent's non-character cards. Deadlock E: Your attack gains Stun: 3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Once per turn] Add 1 foundation to your hand: Add the top card of your deck to your staging area face down committed. Your next check to play a card this turn gets +1. E Commit: Your attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Bubble Man E: This attack gets +1 to its Multiple rating for the rest of this turn. E: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum and your opponent adds the top card of their deck to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Name a card. Your opponent reveals their hand and discards all copies of the named card. E: If this is your first attack this turn, the next card you attempt to play this turn passes (no check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you play this attack as a reversal, your opponent adds the top card of their deck to their card pool face down. E: This attack gets +1 speed for each card in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Oil Man E: This attack gets +1 damage for each face down card in your staging area. E: Unflip 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, add 1 card from your discard pile to the of your deck. E Lose 1 vitality: Add 1 card from your staging area to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your printed hand size is lower than your opponent's printed hand size, this attack gets -1 difficulty. E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's foundations (maximum 10).

property.name: CardText
property.value: G:M E: Draw 1 card for each foundation that has been added to your staging area this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card leaves your card pool during the Combat Phase, draw 1 card. R: After you play this attack, your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard 1 card from your opponent's card pool: Commit your opponent's character. E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent discards their entire momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent's checks gets -1. Time Man E: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum. E: Gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your opponent's attacks get -2 damage and their block modifiers get +1. Deadlock E: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage for each card in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Once per turn]: After you play a Multiple attack, ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After you play your first card this turn, commit 2 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, flip: After your opponent plays an ability on a non-character card that would gain vitality, cancel its effects and gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack has 1 or fewer keywords, draw a card. Plant Man E Flip 1 other foundation: Add this card to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy: After an attack is played, discard 1 card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your opponent's block modifier to block this attack gets +2. R [Once per Enhance Step]: After you discard any number of cards from your hand, your attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy, discard 1 momentum: After you check a 1, re-check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if your opponent has no cards in their card pool. E: This attack gets +1 damage. Only playable if your opponent has at least 1 card in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you take 4 or more damage from an attack, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Lose X vitality: Before the Damage Step of your opponent's attack, it deals no damage. Add 1 of your opponent's foundations to their hand. X equals half of that attack's damage (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool]: After you block with this card, you may attempt to play it as a reversal after the blocked attack resolves. R [Card Pool] Remove, discard 2 momentum: After youropponent plays an attack, discard it from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, draw 1 card. E Commit 1 foundation: If your opponent has more vitality than you do, destroy 1 foundation that was committed due to this attack's Stun ability.
